head.supplied: 1/2/59 ¶ ¶ By desire of the Chief Secy I have the honor to ack rect of yr Le ¶ 27 Jany ¶ referg to the arrangements made for the reception & care of the Alpacas which have been shipped on board the...

div.p: No. 210, unit 4, p. 47, VPRS 1187 outward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

By desire of the Chief Secy I have the honor to ack rect of yr Le
acknowledge receipt of your letter. 27 Jany
M to J. O'Shanassy, 27 January 1859. referg to the arrangements made for the reception & care of the Alpacas which have been shipped on board the "Goddess' for the Governmt. I am to intimate that Mr O'Shanassy has given his approval to the arrangemt & that Mess Westgarth Ross & Co have been informed that you are prepared to receive the animals.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: The Director of the Botanic Garden Melbourne
